channel.title: Pages on Syniti Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Syniti Documentation

item.title: API Ping Agent
item.description: API Ping Agent Use this page to [test the BackOffice IGC Connector Agent connection to DSP](../Config/Test_a_BackOffice_IGC_Agent_Connection_in_DSP). To access this page, navigate to Agent Interface > Configuration > APIs > API Ping Agent in the Navigation pane Field Description Ping Agent Click to check the BackOffice IGC Connector Agent connection to the DSP. Base URL Displays the RESTServer address for the BackOffice IGC Agent.

item.title: API Status Log
item.description: API Status Log This page is used by the BackOffice Support team while troubleshooting issues related to API calls.

item.title: Data Quality Report Assignment
item.description: Data Quality Report Assignment Use this page to [Configure the IGC Migration dashboard](../Use_Cases/Configure_the_Migration_Dashboard). To access this page: Select Agent Interface > Dashboards > Migration Dashboard in the Navigation pane. Click the Data Quality Report Assignment icon for a wave. Field Description WAVE PROCESS AREA ID Displays the name of the wave-process area combination for which the error and opportunity reports are selected.

item.title: Parameters
item.description: Parameters Use this page to [add the BackOffice IGC Connector Agent URL in DSP](../Config/Test_a_BackOffice_IGC_Agent_Connection_in_DSP). To access this page, navigate to Agent Interface > Configuration > Parameters in the Navigation pane. Field Description Agent URL Displays the RESTServer address for the BackOffice IGC Connector Agent. The RESTServer address must be set to "http://localhost:8000/rpc". This URL is used by the API Ping Agent page to test the Connector Agentâ€™s connection to DSP.

item.title: Wave Identification H
item.description: Wave Identification H Wave Identification V Use this page to [Configure the Migration dashboard](../Use_Cases/Configure_the_Migration_Dashboard). To access this page, select Agent Interface > Dashboards > Migration Dashboard in the Navigation pane. Field Description WAVE ID Displays the name of the active wave. Click the wave name to open the Waves page for that wave in Console. SEND WAVE AND MILESTONE METRICS

item.title: Wave Milestones H
item.description: Wave Milestones H Wave Milestones V Use this page to [Configure the IGC Migration dashboard](../Use_Cases/Configure_the_Migration_Dashboard). To access this page: Select Agent Interface > Dashboards > Migration Dashboard in the Navigation pane. Click the Milestones icon for a wave. Field Description NAME Displays the name of the milestone. ABBREVIATION Displays a four-character abbreviation of the milestone name that displays on the Migration dashboard.
